DOC.brief_summary: This single- country , interventional , double-arm study involve Chinese Elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Nutritional Status With Oral Nutritional Supplement Chinese Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim understand follow : 1 . The effect long-term Oral Nutritional Supplementation ( ONS ) improve nutritional health status Chinese elderly . 2 . The impact long-term ONS health cost include medical cost social health care burden . 3 . The impact long-term ONS life quality elderly . The study include Screening Visit ( Day -7~0 ) , Visit 1 ( Day 0 ) Visit 7 ( Day 168Â±3 ) . Enrollment anticipate 666 subject , Male female Chinese age > = 60 year , get 400 evaluable subject .

Subject experience hospital stay surgery within 6 month prior enrollment ; 6 . Subject take medication concomitant chronic disease stable dosage least 3 week . 7 . Subject plan live community 6 month recruitment . 8 . Subject voluntarily sign date informed consent form , approve Independent Ethics Committee/Institutional Review Board ( IEC/IRB ) prior participation study . 1 .
